settings.html:
<style>
img.ikonce_10.ls-is-cached.lazyloaded{    width: 121px;height: 122px;;padding-bottom:8px}
.col-img.slika-subkategorija {
    width: auto!important;
}


a.kategorija.collection__filter-link.link.link--primary{text-align:center}

.kategorija{display:block}

.expandable-content__toggle:before{background:linear-gradient(0deg, #f3f5f7, transparent)
}

.kategorija{position:relative}
.kategorija::after{
content:'';position:absolute;top:0;bottom:0;left:0;right:0;
opacity:0;
box-shadow:0 0rem 1rem -0.25em rgb(10 104 206 / 50%);
transition: opacity:0.5s ease;
}
.kategorija:hover::after {
opacity:1
}


.collection__filter-collapsible[aria-hidden=false] {
  height:unset!important;
padding-bottom:20px!important
}
.kategorija-cel.collection__filter-linklist {
    display: grid;
grid-template-columns:repeat(auto-fit, minmax(250px, 1fr));
    white-space: unset;
    overflow-x: unset!important;
   position:unset;
}

button.collection__filter-link.link.link--primary1{display:none}
.collection__filter-linklist .collection__filter-linklist{
padding-left:0px;font-weight:700;
}




@media screen and (max-width: 641px){
a.kategorija.collection__filter-link.link.link--primary{display:flex!important}

ul.kategorija-cel.collection__filter-linklist {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr;
gap: 5px;
}
.katego {
    margin: 0px;
}
.kategorija-napis {
    font-size: 17px;
}


a.kategorija.collection__filter-link.link.link--primary{padding:7px;gap:30px}




img.ikonce_10.ls-is-cached.lazyloaded{width:100px;height:100px}
a.kategorija.collection__filter-link.link.link--primary{min-height:80px}
}



.expandable-content[aria-expanded] {
    position: relative;
    max-height: 130px;
    overflow: hidden;
    padding-left: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
    margin-bottom: 30px;
    border: unset;
    
}
a.kategorija.collection__filter-link.link.link--primary.is-active {
    display: none!important;
}
</style>
